installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# steamcmd Base Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
# Image to install with is 'ubuntu:18.04'
sleep 10;
## just in case someone removed the defaults.
if [ "${STEAM_USER}" == "" ]; then
    STEAM_USER=anonymous
    STEAM_PASS=""
    STEAM_AUTH=""
fi

apk update
apk add libgcc wget

## download and install steamcmd
cd /tmp
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamcmd
cd /mnt/server/steamcmd
wget http://media.steampowered.com/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
tar -xzvf steamcmd_linux.tar.gz

mkdir -p /mnt/server/Engine/Binaries/ThirdParty/SteamCMD/Linux
#tar -xzvf steamcmd_linux.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/Engine/Binaries/ThirdParty/SteamCMD/Linux
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamapps # Fix steamcmd disk write error when this folder is missing
cd /mnt/server/steamcmd

# SteamCMD fails otherwise for some reason, even running as root.
# This is changed at the end of the install process anyways.
chown -R root:root /mnt
export HOME=/mnt/server

## install game using steamcmd
./steamcmd.sh +force_install_dir /mnt/server/LinuxServer +login ${STEAM_USER} ${STEAM_PASS} ${STEAM_AUTH} +app_update 884110 -beta InDev -betapassword AlwaysWantedToSeeAGhost +quit ## other flags may be needed depending on install. looking at you cs 1.6

mv /mnt/server/steamcmd/linux64/steamclient.so /mnt/server/Pandemic/Binaries/Linux
